tu.tuid: Value is required and can't be empty

tu.tuid: '%value%' is not between '%min%' and '%max%', inclusively

tu.tuid: Too many files, maximum '%max%' are allowed but '%count%' are given

tuv.seg: Có '%count%', quá nhiều tập tin, tối đa '%max%' tập tin

tu.tuid: Too few files, minimum '%min%' are expected but '%count%' are given
